alert.note: Alert for Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 2:37PM MST until January 08 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM FRIDAY TO 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow. Snowfall accumulations of 1 to 2 feet have occurred, with locally higher amounts over 30 inches. Additional snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph this afternoon. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph Friday afternoon. * WHERE...Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 11 PM MST this evening. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 11 AM Friday to 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible over Teton and Togwotee Passes. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Please monitor JHAVALANCHE.ORG for the avalanche risk across western Wyoming.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
